last_episode_to_air.name: The Probe
last_episode_to_air.overview: After flying into a hurricane, the crew of a cargo plane bound for Tokyo is captured by an alien space probe.

name: The Outer Limits
overview: The Outer Limits is an anthology tv series of self-contained sci-fi-horror stories, sometimes with a plot twist at the end.
tagline: There is nothing wrong with your television. Do not attempt to adjust the picture.

episodes.name: The Galaxy Being
episodes.overview: A radio station engineer named Allan Maxwell establishes contact with an alien being. But when the station's power is turned up, the alien is teleported to Earth where its radioactive nature causes havoc.

episodes.name: The Hundred Days of the Dragon
episodes.overview: A sinister foreign power replaces the President of the United States with its own agent via the use of a powerful drug allowing the skin to be temporarily molded into any likeness.

episodes.name: The Architects of Fear
episodes.overview: A noble scheme goes horribly awry when a group of scientists plan an elaborate hoax designed to frighten and ultimately unite humankind.

episodes.name: The Man with the Power
episodes.overview: A radical experiment gives a college professor incredible power, which his subconcious mind uses to destroy his enemies.

episodes.name: The Sixth Finger
episodes.overview: A scientist discovers a way to speed up evolution and tries out the process on a simple miner.

episodes.name: The Man Who Was Never Born
episodes.overview: An astronaut travels to the 23rd Century, where he finds the Earth a blasted wasteland inhabited by monsters.

episodes.name: O.B.I.T.
episodes.overview: A new invention allows spying on anyone, anywhere.

episodes.name: The Human Factor
episodes.overview: At a military base far in the arctic, a man invents a machine which allows two minds to contact one another. An earthquake causes a malfunction and two men wake up to find that their minds have switched bodies.

guest_stars.character: Dr. James Hamilton / Major Roger Brothers
guest_stars.name: Gary Merrill

guest_stars.character: Major Roger Brothers / Dr. James Hamilton
guest_stars.name: Harry Guardino

episodes.name: Corpus Earthling
episodes.overview: A man with a steel plate in his head overhears conversations about global conquest. But where are the voices coming from?

episodes.name: Nightmare
episodes.overview: In a war action with the planet Ebon, some soldiers are captured, interrogated and tortured.

episodes.name: It Crawled Out of the Woodwork
episodes.overview: An incredible being made of pure energy imperils the staff of a research lab and hides a deadly secret.

episodes.name: The Borderland
episodes.overview: A scientist named Ian Fraser invents a machine which can pierce the borderland between this world and... The Afterlife? Maybe. Fraser convinces an industrialist to finance future experiments with the possibility of contacting the rich man's dead son.

episodes.name: Tourist Attraction
episodes.overview: In a South American country a group of explorers discover a prehistoric monster in an ancient lake. The discovery leads them into conflict with the country's dictator.

episodes.name: The Zanti Misfits
episodes.overview: Exiles from the planet Zanti arrive on Earth, and a startling truth is uncovered when two human renegades invade their privacy.

episodes.name: The Mice
episodes.overview: A convict serving a life sentence finds that he has an alternative: change places with an alien.

episodes.name: Controlled Experiment
episodes.overview: Two Martian investigators probe our custom of homicide.

episodes.name: Don't Open Till Doomsday
episodes.overview: A young couple's honeymoon is cut short by the horrifying contents of a mysterious box.

episodes.name: ZZZZZ
episodes.overview: A queen bee assumes a human appearance in order to make an unwary scientist into her new mate.

episodes.name: The Invisibles
episodes.overview: A government agent infiltrates a secret criminal organization that uses alien parasites to control its members.

guest_stars.character: Henry Castle (as William O. Douglas Jr.)
guest_stars.name: William Douglas

episodes.name: The Bellero Shield
episodes.overview: A scientist captures an alien that can protect itself with an unbreakable shield.

episodes.name: The Children of Spider County
episodes.overview: Four scientists disappear in one day. All were born in the same county, on the same day. A fifth scientist is in jail and a federal agent is assigned to the case. The fifth man is sprung from jail by a mysterious stranger who says he's the young man's father.

episodes.name: Specimen: Unknown
episodes.overview: Scientists on a space station discover an unusual and dangerous plant.

episodes.name: Second Chance
episodes.overview: A group of people board an amusement park ride. Then they (and their surprised "captain") find that they're really going on a space jaunt.

episodes.name: Moonstone
episodes.overview: Workers on a moon base find a mysterious rock that appears to be alive.

episodes.name: The Mutant
episodes.overview: A radioactive rainstorm at a scientific base on a distant planet mutates a scientist driving him insane and making him telepathic.

episodes.name: The Guests
episodes.overview: After discovering an elderly man dying by the side of the road, a young man finds a strange house where some people are kept prisoner and ageless by an alien intelligence.

episodes.name: Fun and Games
episodes.overview: Two Earth people are transported to an alien planet, along with two aliens. The are told by their abductors that they will fight each other to the death. The stakes are high: the homeworld of the losers will be destroyed slowly, for the further amusement of their captors.

episodes.name: The Special One
episodes.overview: Parents of a gifted youngster discover that their son's new tutor is not quite human.

episodes.name: A Feasibility Study
episodes.overview: The people of Earth surprise their alien captors when an entire neighborhood is transported to another planet as part of a plan to enslave the human race.

episodes.name: Production and Decay of Strange Particles
episodes.overview: An accident in a nuclear research facility opens a dimensonal doorway and allows deadly creatures to emerge.

episodes.name: The Chameleon
episodes.overview: A government agent faces a crisis of conscience when he infiltrates a band of aliens marooned aboard the wreckage of a flying saucer.

episodes.name: The Forms of Things Unknown
episodes.overview: A crazy man invents a machine that can tilt time and bring the dead back to life.

episodes.name: Soldier
episodes.overview: Two soldiers from the future are thrust back through time to the present day.

guest_stars.character: Paul Tanner / Voice in The Enemy's war helmet (voice)
guest_stars.name: Tim O'Connor

episodes.name: Cold Hands, Warm Heart
episodes.overview: After returning from a mission to Venus, an astronaut can't seem to stay warm enough and has strange dreams about encountering a wraith-like being outside his spaceship window.

episodes.name: Behold, Eck!
episodes.overview: A scientist invents a pair of glasses which enable him to see and communicate with a two dimensional being.

episodes.name: Expanding Human
episodes.overview: A man experimenting with conciousness expansion drugs becomes super-human and not really human at all.

episodes.name: Demon with a Glass Hand
episodes.overview: A man with a glass hand attempts to unravel the mystery of who he is.

episodes.name: Cry of Silence
episodes.overview: A couple of motorists stranded in the desert are stalked by a bunch of tumbleweeds.

episodes.name: The Invisible Enemy
episodes.overview: A manned mission to Mars is menaced by Martian creatures who swim in the planet's sandy soil.

episodes.name: Wolf 359
episodes.overview: A college professor recreates the environment of a distant planet in a lab in order to study its evolution... which happens quickly.

episodes.name: I, Robot
episodes.overview: A robot is put on trial for the murder of his creator.

episodes.name: The Inheritors Part I
episodes.overview: After being shot in the head, a soldier gains a genius IQ and begins working fervently toward a mysterious goal.

episodes.name: The Inheritors Part II
episodes.overview: An investigation reveals a desperate plan involving the construction of a spaceship and a group of special children.

episodes.name: Keeper of the Purple Twilight
episodes.overview: An alien offers his technical knowledge of how to build a ray gun in exchange for a scientist's ability to feel emotions.

episodes.name: The Duplicate Man
episodes.overview: A man wants to capture a dangerous alien creature. Doing it himself would be way too dangerous, so he has his clone do it.

episodes.name: Counterweight
episodes.overview: Six future astronauts are put through a simulation of a long space flight.

episodes.name: The Brain of Colonel Barham
episodes.overview: A dying astronaut agrees to have his brain implanted into a robot body.

episodes.name: The Premonition
episodes.overview: An out-of-control test flight traps a pilot and his wife in a slow-moving time warp, and they're not alone.

episodes.name: The Probe
episodes.overview: After flying into a hurricane, the crew of a cargo plane bound for Tokyo is captured by an alien space probe.
